attributes.action: Stop St Richards Hospital from closing accident and emergency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Chichester has important events that other localities do not have.
i.e 1.Festival of speed at Goodwood (one of the biggest events in the world)
2.Goodwood racecourse.
3.Yacht marina.
4.We also have a peninsular with thousands of residents and holiday makers to be responsable for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
